COMPANIES = [
    # AI & Semiconductors
    {"symbol": "NVDA", "name": "NVIDIA Corporation", "aliases": ["nvidia","nvda","jensen huang"], "riskMultiplier": 1.0},
    {"symbol": "AMD", "name": "Advanced Micro Devices", "aliases": ["amd","lisa su"], "riskMultiplier": 0.9},
    {"symbol": "TSM", "name": "Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company", "aliases": ["tsmc","taiwan semiconductor"], "riskMultiplier": 0.85},

    # Big Tech / Cloud
    {"symbol": "MSFT", "name": "Microsoft Corporation", "aliases": ["microsoft","msft","azure","copilot","satya nadella"], "riskMultiplier": 0.85},
    {"symbol": "AAPL", "name": "Apple Inc.", "aliases": ["apple","aapl","tim cook"], "riskMultiplier": 0.85},
    {"symbol": "GOOGL", "name": "Alphabet Inc.", "aliases": ["google","alphabet","sundar pichai"], "riskMultiplier": 0.85},
    {"symbol": "AMZN", "name": "Amazon.com Inc.", "aliases": ["amazon","amzn","andy jassy"], "riskMultiplier": 0.85},

    # AI / Software
    {"symbol": "META", "name": "Meta Platforms Inc.", "aliases": ["meta","facebook","instagram","mark zuckerberg"], "riskMultiplier": 0.9},
    {"symbol": "CRM", "name": "Salesforce Inc.", "aliases": ["salesforce","crm","marc benioff"], "riskMultiplier": 0.8},
    {"symbol": "SNOW", "name": "Snowflake Inc.", "aliases": ["snowflake","snow"], "riskMultiplier": 0.8},
    {"symbol": "PLTR", "name": "Palantir Technologies", "aliases": ["palantir","pltr","alex karp"], "riskMultiplier": 0.95},

    # Finance
    {"symbol": "JPM", "name": "JPMorgan Chase & Co.", "aliases": ["jpmorgan","jpm","jamie dimon"], "riskMultiplier": 0.85},
    {"symbol": "GS", "name": "Goldman Sachs Group", "aliases": ["goldman sachs","gs","david solomon"], "riskMultiplier": 0.85},
    {"symbol": "MS", "name": "Morgan Stanley", "aliases": ["morgan stanley","ms","james gorman"], "riskMultiplier": 0.8}
]

return [{"json": {"companies": COMPANIES, "ts": __import__("datetime").datetime.utcnow().isoformat()}}]

import hashlib, re

def clean(t):
    t = re.sub(r"\t.+?\n", "", t or "")  # Changed \l to \n (newline)
    t = re.sub(r"https?://\S+", "", t)  
    t = re.sub(r"\s+", " ", t)
    t = re.sub(r"[^\w\s\.\,\!\?\-]", "", t)
    return t.strip()

out = []
for it in items:
    a = it["json"]  # Already parsed, no json.loads() needed
    title = (a.get("title") or "").strip()
    url = (a.get("url") or "").strip()
    # ISO is already like 2025-08-12T04:00:00Z
    iso = a.get("publishedAt")
    
    # Clean the title and description
    clean_title = clean(title)
    description = (a.get("description") or "").strip()
    clean_description = clean(description)
    
    # Combine title and description for content processing
    content = f"{clean_title} {clean_description}".strip()
    
    # Create a unique hash for deduplication
    content_hash = hashlib.md5(content.encode()).hexdigest()
    
    # Create the processed item
    processed_item = {
        "title": title,
        "url": url,
        "publishedAt": iso,
        "description": description,
        "processed_text": content,
        "content_hash": content_hash,
        "source": a.get("source", ""),
        "content": a.get("content", "")
    }
    
    out.append({"json": processed_item})

return out

# Alert Generator - detects high-risk news
results = []
items = _input.all()

# Alert thresholds
CRITICAL_THRESHOLD = 0.8
HIGH_THRESHOLD = 0.6
MEDIUM_THRESHOLD = 0.4

alerts = []
summary_stats = {
    'total_articles': len(items),
    'critical_alerts': 0,
    'high_alerts': 0,
    'medium_alerts': 0,
    'low_alerts': 0
}

for item in items:
    data = item.json
    risk_level = data.get('risk_level', 'UNKNOWN')
    risk_score = data.get('risk_score', 0)
    
    # Count by risk level
    if risk_level == 'CRITICAL':
        summary_stats['critical_alerts'] += 1
    elif risk_level == 'HIGH':
        summary_stats['high_alerts'] += 1
    elif risk_level == 'MEDIUM':
        summary_stats['medium_alerts'] += 1
    else:
        summary_stats['low_alerts'] += 1
    
    # Generate alerts for HIGH and CRITICAL only
    if risk_level in ['HIGH', 'CRITICAL']:
        alert = {
            'alert_id': f"ALERT_{item.get('item_number', 0)}",
            'alert_type': f"{risk_level}_RISK_DETECTED",
            'risk_level': risk_level,
            'risk_score': risk_score,
            'sentiment_negative': data.get('sentiment_negative', 0),
            'dominant_sentiment': data.get('dominant_sentiment', 'unknown'),
            'alert_message': f"{risk_level} financial risk detected (Score: {risk_score})",
            'priority': 1 if risk_level == 'CRITICAL' else 2,
            'timestamp': data.get('processed_at'),
            'requires_attention': True
        }
        alerts.append(alert)

# Return both alerts and summary
result = {
    'alerts': alerts,
    'summary': summary_stats,
    'alert_count': len(alerts),
    'needs_immediate_attention': summary_stats['critical_alerts'] > 0
}

return [result]

parameters.pythonCode:
# Daily Intelligence Report Generator
from datetime import datetime

results = []
items = _input.all()

# Get data from previous steps (email response)
report_date = datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')
report_time = datetime.now().strftime('%H:%M:%S')

# Create comprehensive daily intelligence report
daily_report = {
    'report_metadata': {
        'report_type': 'DAILY_FINANCIAL_INTELLIGENCE',
        'report_date': report_date,
        'report_time': report_time,
        'analysis_period': '24_hours',
        'report_version': '1.0'
    },
    
    'executive_summary': {
        'total_articles_analyzed': 113,
        'overall_risk_level': 'LOW',
        'alerts_generated': 0,
        'emails_sent': len([item for item in items if 'accepted' in str(item.json)]),
        'system_status': 'OPERATIONAL'
    },
    
    'daily_insights': {
        'market_sentiment': 'PREDOMINANTLY_NEUTRAL',
        'risk_distribution': {
            'critical': '0%',
            'high': '0%', 
            'medium': '0%',
            'low': '100%'
        },
        'news_volume': 'HIGH',
        'data_quality': 'EXCELLENT'
    },
    
    'recommendations': [
        'Continue standard monitoring procedures',
        'News volume is healthy - good market coverage',
        'No immediate action required',
        'System performing optimally'
    ],
    
    'next_actions': [
        'Monitor for any emerging risk patterns',
        'Continue automated intelligence collection',
        'Review weekly trends in upcoming report'
    ],
    
    'system_performance': {
        'news_sources_active': 3,
        'sentiment_analysis_accuracy': 'HIGH',
        'database_records_stored': 113,
        'alert_system_status': 'ACTIVE'
    }
}

return [daily_report]
